PAGE.PREFOOTER_TEXT2: With BeautyBook you can book your appointment in seconds.
PAGE.PREFOOTER_TEXT3: Discover the best professionals in your area and book instantly.

ABOUT.SECTION1_TEXT: An intelligent, free platform that connects you with beauty professionals near you. From a haircut or facial, to a relaxing massage‚Äîyou‚Äôll find it in seconds.
ABOUT.SECTION2_TEXT: Forget calls or messages. With BeautyBook you can book online 24/7, wherever you are.
ABOUT.SECTION3_TEXT: We help professionals and salons better manage their schedules and reach more clients. Because we believe in a more connected, efficient, and digital beauty industry.
ABOUT.SECTION4_TEXT: To create a seamless, accessible experience both for service providers and those who enjoy them. At BeautyBook, every appointment is an opportunity to look and feel your best.

PRIVACY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY.INTRO: At BeautyBook, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring that your personal information is handled securely and responsibly. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your data when you use our web platform or services.
PRIVACY.SECTION1_TEXT: We collect only the information necessary to provide our services, such as:
SECTION2_LIST: Manage and confirm your beauty appointments.
Improve our platform through anonymous analytics.
PRIVACY.SECTION3_TEXT1: We employ cookies and tracking tools to:
SECTION3_LIST: Analyze site usage and optimize the experience.
PRIVACY.SECTION3_TEXT2: You can manage or disable cookies from your browser settings, though this may affect certain functionalities.
PRIVACY.SECTION4_TEXT: BeautyBook will not sell or rent your personal information. We may share data with:
SECTION4_LIST: Legal authorities if required by law.
PRIVACY.SECTION5_TEXT: We implement state-of-the-art technical and organizational measures‚Äîsuch as SSL/TLS encryption, secure authentication, and access controls‚Äîto protect your data from unauthorized access, loss, or alteration.
PRIVACY.SECTION6_TEXT: We retain your information only as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes described, as well as for legal obligations or dispute resolution. Once those purposes are met, we will securely delete or anonymize the data.
SECTION7_LIST: Access, rectify, and delete your personal data.
Object to or restrict processing in certain circumstances.
PRIVACY.SECTION7_TEXT2: To exercise these rights, write to us at <1>help.en@beauty.com</1>.
PRIVACY.CHANGES_TEXT: BeautyBook may occasionally update this Privacy Policy. We will notify you of significant changes via the platform or by email. We recommend reviewing it periodically.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact Us
CONTACT.INTRO: At BeautyBook we want to make your experience seamless. If you have questions, suggestions or need assistance, write to us and we'll reply in a flash.
CONTACT.FOOTER: Our goal is to offer you a fast and personalized experience. Drop us a line‚Äî we're here to help you grow!

FAQ.TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.Q1_QUESTION: What are the benefits of using BeautyBook compared to other booking methods?
FAQ.Q1_ANSWER: BeautyBook gives you a fast, simple, and organized way to book beauty services without calls or waiting. You can browse available professionals, read real reviews, compare prices, check real-time schedules, and manage your appointments all from one place ‚Äî in just a few clicks and on any device.
FAQ.Q2_ANSWER: Yes! BeautyBook is completely free for clients. You pay no commission for booking an appointment. You only pay for the service you book with your chosen beauty professional.
FAQ.Q3_QUESTION: Can I use BeautyBook outside of my country?
FAQ.Q3_ANSWER: BeautyBook is designed to offer you flexibility wherever you are. You can use the platform anywhere in the world. If you're traveling, simply change your location in the app to find available professionals near you (depending on local availability).
FAQ.Q4_QUESTION: How can I contact a service provider directly?
FAQ.Q4_ANSWER: You can contact a provider directly from their profile on BeautyBook. Each professional has a contact section where you can send a message, call, or even chat if that option is offered. You'll also receive notifications and reminders to stay in touch before and after your appointment.
